item.title: uKnit - CodeTab
item.description: uKnit I love unit tests but hate the process of writing them. Every Java developer knows the dull routine: look at the code in the source editor, toggle to the test code editor, create or copy variables, initialize, write assertions, and repeat the mind-numbing chore hundreds of times more. To complete a single test case, you have to toggle dozens of times and make equal or even more cuts and pastes.
